title: Dino In Space
description: A dinosaur decides to leave Earth behind and explore the stars. Based on a true story, not.

title: Tiny Rex’s Big Day
description: A small dinosaur with tiny arms faces a huge challenge: winning the annual Dino Olympics.

title: Cretaceous Park Rangers
description: When dinosaurs start running wild, only two rookie park rangers can restore order with style.

title: The Fossil Whisperer
description: A paleontologist accidentally brings fossils back to life—and they want their museum back.

title: Meteor and Me
description: A heartfelt story about a dino who befriends the meteor that’s supposed to end it all.

title: Jurassic Groove
description: A funky T-Rex discovers his love for disco and must dance to save the prehistoric planet.

title: Lost Eggs of Raptoria
description: An epic adventure where brave raptors travel across volcanoes to find their stolen eggs.

title: Dino High
description: Teenage dinosaurs face friendship, exams, and the occasional asteroid drill at Dino High School.

title: T-Rex Detective
description: A retired T-Rex becomes a private investigator solving prehistoric mysteries one bite at a time.

title: The Ice Age Roar
description: A group of dinosaurs struggle to survive the coldest age in history with teamwork and loud roars.

title: Dino Chef
description: A velociraptor with a taste for fine dining opens the first prehistoric restaurant in town.

title: Time Travelosaurus
description: A time-traveling stegosaurus visits the future to warn humans about their plastic habits.
